attributes.action: introduce legislation requiring that News Editors and Journalists be chosen by public ballot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the past few weeks it has become clear that those who exist within the Westminster Bubble are completely out of control.

In addition to sweeping reforms that must be made to the parliamentary system, something has to be done about these tired old hacks who continually feed off each others scraps.

The news media has failed in it's obligation to inform the wider public of the party positions in the forthcoming European elections. This is gross incompetence by a self-serving and institutionalised group.

Who is holding these un-elected individuals to account?

There needs to be some redress.
